name: Fabled Marchosia
text: If this card is in your hand: You can discard up to 2 monsters, including a "Fabled" monster, except "Fabled Marchosia", and if you do, Special Summon this card, and if you do that, it gains 200 ATK for each monster discarded by this effect. If this card is discarded to the GY: Add 1 "Fabled" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Fabled Marchosia" once per turn.
